Key Match Events: Tyrese Haliburton and Myles Turner had monster games for the Pacers, with Turner finishing with a season-high 30 points and Haliburton casually racking up 25 points and 12 assists
Post-Match Reflections: Dallas had another slow start, as the Pacers got off to a 15-2 lead before the Mavericks ever made their first field goal
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the first stretch big that the Mavericks have faced this year, and Myles Turner gave them all sorts of problems
Dallas wants to protect the paint and will have issues against the Indianas and Bostons of the world
Others: Naji Marshall had his best game as a Maverick on Sunday night, then blew that performance out of the water for his sixth-career 20 points game
This team needs Dereck Lively II, his mobility and range change so many shots throughout the course of a game
